text: James Leon Stanfield (born 1934) is a former Welsh international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== Stanfield became the British singles champion after winning the British Isles Bowls Championships in 1966. He was a teacher by trade and was the Secretary for the Troedyrhiw Bowls Club. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh male bowls players
